|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM63168; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- MIPS Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = AC:5D:10 |oui = AC:5D:10
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = PACEXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^PACE[0-9A-F]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/04/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *5168NV XDSL VOICE GATEWAY :VDSL2, ADSL2+ Gateway with 802.11n Wi-Fi & HomePNA<small> :Dual-core processor with hardware accelerated routing for exceptional performance. :High-powered 802.11n 2x2 MIMO wireless technology virtually eliminates wireless. :Enable Gigabit service offerings utilizing the integrated Gigabit Ethernet switch. </small> Additional models states in the manual include.. *5168NV, uDSL WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn, 2 x FXS (VOIP) *5168N, uDSL WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn *5138NV, uDSL WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn, 2 x FXS (VOIP) *5138N, uDSL WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn *5133NV, uDSL - no HPNA - WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn, 2 x FXS (VOIP) *5133N, uDSL - no HPNA - WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn *5108NV, Ethernet WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn, 2 x FXS (VOIP) *5108N, Ethernet WAN, 4x 10/100, 2x2 bgn
The label states a sample SSID as '''PACE0AB'''. '''0AB''' is also printed on the sample :label as the last three hex digits of the router serial number. The manual states the default IP is 192.168.1.254. :Appears to be [[Broadcom]] based (5111NV [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=1574863 block diagram])
==Links of Interest== *{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/products/5168nv-xdsl-voice-gateway/}} (Arris) *[http://www.dslreports.com/hardware/Pace-5168NV-h4059 ''Pace 5168NV'' on '''DSLReports'''] *[https://kb.intermedia.net/Article/2926 ''Pace 5168NV'' on '''InterMedia''']
==See also== *[[2Wire 3800HGV-B]] *[[Pace 3801HGV]] ([[2Wire]]) *[[Pace 5012NV]] ([[2Wire]]) *[[Pace 5031NV]] *Pace 5168NV-110 (Arris Global Limited) - [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 *[[Pace 5268AC]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 ([https://www.iol.unh.edu/testing/broadband/gvector/equipment testing]) *[[Arris NVG448B]] (Arris Group, Inc.) - VDSL2 CPE [[Broadcom]] 63148 *[[Arris NVG599]] *[[Arris NVG595]]
